word_descriptions.ah: An expression of realization or surprise.
word_descriptions.ai: An expression of pain or surprise.
word_descriptions.am: They love; third person plural of amar.
word_descriptions.ao: To the; contraction of a o.
word_descriptions.be: To drink; imperative form of beber.
word_descriptions.co: With; a prefix meaning with or together.
word_descriptions.da: Of the; contraction of de a.
word_descriptions.de: Of, from; indicating origin or possession.
word_descriptions.do: Of the; contraction of de o.
word_descriptions.eh: An expression of inquiry or doubt.
word_descriptions.em: In, on, at; preposition indicating location.
word_descriptions.es: Are; second person singular present of ser.
word_descriptions.et: And; used in some regional dialects.
word_descriptions.fa: Do; second person singular present of fazer.
word_descriptions.lo: It; masculine singular direct object pronoun.
word_descriptions.ma: But; used to introduce a contrast.
word_descriptions.me: Me; first person singular object pronoun.
word_descriptions.na: In the; contraction of em a.
word_descriptions.no: In the; contraction of em o.
word_descriptions.oh: An expression of surprise or admiration.
word_descriptions.pi: A type of dessert, short for 'pudim'.
word_descriptions.qu: That; used in some regional dialects.
word_descriptions.se: If; used to introduce conditional clauses.
word_descriptions.te: You; second person singular object pronoun.
word_descriptions.to: I am; informal form of estou.
word_descriptions.um: A, an; masculine singular indefinite article.
word_descriptions.yo: An expression of greeting or attention.
